Attributes.description: Basic concepts and analysis techniques in the context of electric and electronic circuits including Bode plots and the Laplace transform. Treatment of RLC circuits, phasors, op-amps. Introduction to nonlinear circuit elements, diodes, BJT, FET circuits.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: MATH 152 and one of PHYS 108, PHYS 118, PHYS 158.
